metadata.name: Say you'll remember
metadata.description:
This street portrait was captured in downtown Frankfurt, Germany in March 2023. It depicts a woman whose mesmerizing beauty and glamor do not conceal the profound sadness of her gaze. It gives the impression that she is staring after a lost love in the fear of being forgotten. 

Her captivating gaze hits the onlooker in an intimate way and makes every one of us a part of her story.
